website_summaries.verdict: Simple yet elegant, stainless-steel 36-millimeter watch with black leather band.
pros: Classic look with silver stainless steel case and white face
Mineral dial window and minimalist stick indices
Italian leather calfskin band conforms to wrist
cons: A few buyers seemed to think their product wasn't an original

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but some stitching has come loose
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this watch pretty much every day since I got it. Most of my clothes are black/grey/white and most of my (limited) collection of jewelry goes with silver. This watch is unobstrusive and classic, and I've gotten plenty of compliments on it! One thing I have to note is that the stitching on the little band that holds the extra length of the strap has come loose )-:
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch!! I was originally planning to buy this watch from Nordstrom for twice the price, when I found it here! I was a little bit skeptical that the watch would be a fake - but it does not appear to be! Came in original Daniel Wellington packaging and looks gorgeous on!! If it is a fake, it has tricked me and everyone else who has seen it!! The leather is taking some time to wear in - but I am hoping that is just the leather being stiff. Very happy with my purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: Haley S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this watch - it looks great without looking too ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this at Nordstrom for $215, then saw it here on Amazon for $103. Needless to say, I returned the watch and then ordered here. LOVE this watch - it looks great without looking too oversized, easy to read the time. Packaging was exactly as Nordstrom's; and it arrived right on time. Definitely recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: DW Kearney

customer_reviews.title: lovely watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking watch. I receive compliments from both men and women. My wrist is really narrow but it still looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I am not a watch person myself so I cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a watch person myself so I cannot speak on it too thoroughly, but it was a gift for my wife and she loves it. In that regard I cant complain!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Worst choice, disappointment from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible choice. When I received it, it felt made of pretty cheap materials and the instructions were nonexistent. Returning it promptly as my other choice from Macy’s was better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this watch is excellent. Not too small or too big like 99% ...
customer_reviews.text: As a guy with a small wrist, this watch is excellent. Not too small or too big like 99% of mens watches. It looks exactly like the mens watch also

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my mom. She loves it. Nice quality, clean design, and really easy to read. Look bigger than it actually is because it's all dial.

customer_reviews.title: The watch was wonderful priced and in the same packaging and presentation as ...
customer_reviews.text: Sophisticated looking hIgh quality watch. It arrived exactly as expected. The watch was wonderful priced and in the same packaging and presentation as purchases that I have made on the Daniel Wellington website. I wear this watch daily and it transitions effortlessly from day to evening. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it's very elegant and the price was a lot better than in other websites. It's worth it.

customer_reviews.text: I am in love. This watch looks so classy and can be used dressed up for the office or dressed down for a causal night. I wear it everyday :)

customer_reviews.title: It goes with everything and has held up wonderfully under heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Watch arrived promptly and boxed beautifully. It was a gift for my daughter (30 years old)and she loves it. Exactly as described

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this watch for a while, but I wasn't sure about paying the full price for it ($200 on the official DW site), but for this discounted price, it is SO worth the money, exactly as pictured, perfect size and so classic. You can't go wrong with this watch.

customer_reviews.title: i love the simplicity and it pretty much goes with everything

customer_reviews.title: SCRATCHES EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch but after one week of wearing the face was completely scratched up, it looked cracked! I don't do any strenous work that would permit this kind of damage and I put the watch back in its case every night. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: i like this watch very much

customer_reviews.text: I really liked this watch. It is thin but has a large round face. It would be better with a second hand.

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It lays perfectly on my tiny wrists (which is VERY hard to come by) It's sleek and stylish and easy to dress up and down.

customer_reviews.text: I'm in love!! best decision ever! Love this classic! <3 Very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love the elegant design.. Slim hands, silver markers, just clean and simple. Leather becomes soft quickly, totally comfortable. Love that it can be dressed up or down, especially if you buy extra straps.. Which I will probably end up doing!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this watch for a long time! The strap is genuine leather which will break in over time. The face of the watch is so sleak and stylish. I LOVE it!! ''

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice watch. I've had it for about a month ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch. I've had it for about a month now and it keeps time well. The leather band was a bit stiff at first but, after wearing awhile, is softening up. Nice watch at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the everyday enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! The watch is not a fake and the leather strap is an authentic DW strap. The strap was broken in in a matter of days. It has a big face, but it is not overwhelming. I wear it daily, for fun or play because it's very versatile and I get a lot of compliments. Will buy another DW watch!
customer_reviews.author: Gisel

customer_reviews.title: Simply...beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I have watches that are over $25K. This watch is awesome. Too bad name rec not there.

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch was as described
customer_reviews.text: The watch was as described, however was disappointed that I had to pay import tax on top of the advertised price.

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever

customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch for someone who wants to look effortlessly chic.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite accessory
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. I wear this watch every single day and always get comments on it. The leather strap breaks in pretty quickly and feels more comfortable within a few days. I love love love love this gorgeous and classic piece.

product_meta.title: Daniel Wellington Women's 0608DW Sheffield Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
The 0608DW Sheffield Classic Analog is as cultured and metropolitan as its namesake city, featuring black leather straps, a stainless steel case, and a white face. Elegantly simple, sophisticated, and efficient. This globetrotting beauty features Daniel Wellington's signature round face with minimal markings and elegantly slim hands. Luscious Italian leather conforms perfectly to the wearer's wrist, making it an effortless companion for everyday activities on land and at sea. Daniel Wellington timepieces are designed to feel at ease at the office, out on the town, or on deck, and crafted to celebrate the company's impeccable British heritage.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 2.47 Ounces
 * Item model number :DW00100053
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :January 12, 2007
 * Manufacturer :Daniel Wellington
 * ASIN :B00BKQTA4A

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #885,509 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #400148 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #4662 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars802 ratings The 0608DW Sheffield Classic Analog is as cultured and metropolitan as its namesake city, featuring black leather straps, a stainless steel case, and a white face. Elegantly simple, sophisticated, and efficient. This globetrotting beauty features Daniel Wellington's signature round face with minimal markings and elegantly slim hands. Luscious Italian leather conforms perfectly to the wearer's wrist, making it an effortless companion for everyday activities on land and at sea. Daniel Wellington timepieces are designed to feel at ease at the office, out on the town, or on deck, and crafted to celebrate the company's impeccable British heritage.
feature_bullets: Round watch featuring logoed white dial with stick indices
36 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Leather calfskin band with buckle closure
Water resistant to 30 m (99 ft): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
